item.title: Setup Tailwindcss in Django
item.description: I recently was working with django and I kinda wanted to still use tailwind in the world of python. Now I’d never setup a django project from scratch before, I usually picked up from someone else. But this time I wasn’t so lucky. 1. Install tailwindcss, # at the root of your project npm install -D tailwindcss npx tailwindcss init 2. Configuring TaiwindCSS Configure the tailwind.config.js to capture all your files with tailwind classes.
